EvaluatorPointsPerChair - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.am42.model.evaluator
Subclass of evaluator, returns the number of points given by the card by counting the number of chairs in the board Example of chair: |> # backrest -| . |> # seat -> # This particular chair is pointed in the UPLEFT Direction (0, +1)

EvaluatorPointsPerCorner - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.am42.model.evaluator
Subclass of evaluator, returns the number of points times the corners covered by the last placed face on the board
